about.College: SRM Institute of Science and Technology - Modi Nagar Campus

summary.text: I'm a hardworking student at SRMIST Modinagar, studying Technology with a focus on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I believe in working diligently and being punctual. Challenges motivate me, and I'm committed to doing well in my studies and future career. I love AI and ML and want to make a meaningful impact in the tech world.
